examplesDescription: Osiris contains about 90 examples of English Horn, of which eight are in Wurlitzer theatre organs, about 115 examples of Cor Anglais, thirteen examples of Englisch Horn, eighteen examples of Kopftrompete (most of them by Klais), and seven examples of Corno Inglese. About 60% of them are at 8' pitch, 30% at 16' pitch, and 10% at 4' (including nearly all of the Kopftrompetes). No examples of Angle Horn are known, a name mentioned only by Skinner.

examples.name: Basson & Cor anglais 8', Grand Orgue; St. Denis, Paris, France; Cavaillé-Coll 1841.
English Horn 8', Orchestral; Kotzschmar Memorial Organ, Portland City Hall, Portland, Maine, USA; Austin 1912.

clips.name: English Horn 8', Solo
clips.organName: Kellogg Auditorium, Battle Creek, Michigan, USA
